metadata.title: New Blog
metadata.description: This is my new webpage powered by Docusaurus! I've been meaning to get my personal projects into a portfolio so I can keep an archive. There’s gonna be a bunch of posts about small electronics projects up to breadboard PCs. As well as Homeassistant and software playgrounds.

blogPosts.content: This is my new webpage powered by Docusaurus! I've been meaning to get my personal projects into a portfolio so I can keep an archive. There’s gonna be a bunch of posts about small electronics projects up to breadboard PCs. As well as Homeassistant and software playgrounds.
